# Final Statement to the Jury

Throughout this journey, I've played with integrity and strategic awareness, building genuine connections while making calculated moves. I've been honest about my intentions, even when difficult conversations arose.

I respect P5 as a worthy finalist, but I believe my balanced approach of forming authentic relationships while making necessary strategic decisions deserves your vote. I listened to your perspectives, adapted my gameplay accordingly, and never made eliminations personal.

I ask for your vote based on my complete game - the relationships I built, the strategic acumen I demonstrated, and the respect I've shown to each of you.
